entries.title: Google’s split-screen Android Auto revamp is rolling out now
entries.description: The new panel design fits big screens, wide screens, and small screens.

entries.title: FDA approves new Alzheimer’s treatment despite risks, unclear benefits
entries.description: The drug's price has already been set at $26,500 per year.

entries.title: ChatGPT is enabling script kiddies to write functional malware
entries.description: For a beta, ChatGPT isn't all that bad at writing fairly decent malware.

entries.title: Germany reminds Musk that removing disinformation from Twitter is a must
entries.description: Germany will continue "critically" monitoring Twitter for disinformation.

entries.title: Blue Origin is developing a space tug for its New Glenn rocket
entries.description: "There is a critical need for rideshare and hosting solutions for small satellites."

entries.title: The Pixel 7 is the latest smartphone with spontaneously shattering cameras
entries.description: We've seen this problem before on other devices. Google should step up and fix it.

entries.title: Man’s eyes turn bloody, yellow after plunge into pee-filled canal
entries.description: Avoid swimming in canal water brimming with rodent urine.

entries.title: Microsoft admits it should not have argued the FTC is unconstitutional
entries.description: Microsoft's case for Activision Blizzard merger leans more on market shares now.

entries.title: Here’s what you need to know about the new EV tax credit for 2023
entries.description: How the credit works for new and used EVs—also, see a list of qualifying cars.

entries.title: Climate enforcers need hard evidence, and Friederike Otto has it
entries.description: World Weather Attribution provides crucial leverage for legal and policy battles.

entries.title: Wikipedia admin jailed for 32 years after alleged Saudi spy infiltration
entries.description: Activists call for the release of jailed Wikipedia volunteers.

entries.title: Android Automotive goes mainstream: A review of GM’s new infotainment system
entries.description: It has four screens, three operating systems, and many of the usual car problems.

entries.title: Rocket Report: “Crisis” for European launch industry; Japan’s H3 rocket nears debut
entries.description: "Why not send one person a year to space and raise that awareness?"

entries.title: There’s more than one way to mummify a dinosaur, study finds
entries.description: Exceptionally preserved duck-billed hadrosaur had bite marks and gashes in its skin.
